resources.string:
- The password must be 8-16 characters long. 
- The password must contain one lowercase letter. 
- The password must contain one uppercase letter. 
- The password must contain a single digit from 1 to 9. 
- The password must contain one special character.
Check the fields entered, verify that the password meets security requirements
During registration, weight is requested in order to correctly calculate the calories consumed during the run.
Do you want to eliminate the activity ?
Want to log out from FreeRun ?
Do you want to eliminate the run ?

Location permission are required to allow FreeRun to track your location during your run, if not granted you will not be able to view your route during the run, and if your device does not have motion sensors, you will also not be able to track other data such as distance and kilocalories.

Permissions for activity recognition are required to allow FreeRun to track the motor activity for proper calculation of the distance covered. If not granted, the distance run is calculated less accurately using location.
Notification permission are required to allow FreeRun to notify the start of each run, and to allow the user to view the run data even when the device is in the background.
If the device does not have sensors for detecting motor activity, the distance traveled will be calculated using the location, therefore it is recommended to grant location permissions.
